alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN DARKE, SOUTHWESTERN AUGLAIZE AND SOUTHERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Fort Recovery, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, pea size hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, New Bremen, Minster, Versailles, St. Henry, Fort Recovery, Wabash, Osgood, Chickasaw, Burkettsville, North Star, Montezuma, New Weston, Yorkshire, Egypt, Maria Stein, Brock, Eldora Speedway, Carthagena and Willowdell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
